results.deck: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown is a game based on the popular movie starring Will Smith and Martin Lawrence.
results.name: Bad Boys: Miami Takedown

results.deck: Mike Tyson's third official boxing game.
results.name: Mike Tyson Heavyweight Boxing

results.deck: Æon Flux is a game based on the 2005 film, which is based on the cartoon series of the same name. You play as Æon Flux, the top operative of a government rebellion, on her mission to kill a government leader.
results.name: Æon  Flux

results.deck: True Crime: New York City is the sequel to True Crime: Streets of L.A., and is universally considered to be significantly inferior to the original game, with a worse framerate, dumber AI, and bugs that weren't present in L.A.
results.name: True Crime: New York City
Twinkle Star Sprites: La Petite Princesse

results.deck: The prequel to the entire Samurai Shodown series, created after Playmore's acquisition of SNK, completely revamps the button layout again (adding a new Dodge button, bringing back the second game's maneuvers for good use).
results.name: Samurai Shodown V
SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.21: SDI & Quartet -SEGA SYSTEM 16 COLLECTION-

results.deck: Also known as Simple Series 2000 Vol. 61: The OneeChanbara, the first game in the Oneechanbara series.
results.name: Zombie Zone

results.deck: A Rugby League game titled depending upon each region's league (NRL for Australia, Super League for the UK). It contained Club teams from both Australia and Britain, as well as international teams.
results.name: NRL Rugby League

results.deck: The Guy Game is a simple, adult-oriented trivia game that became infamous when it was revealed that one of the girls who appeared nude in the game was underage, and the game was technically considered child pornography by American law.
results.name: The Guy Game

results.deck: Step into the boots of either a Union soldier or a Confederate soldier and fight in some of the bloodiest battles of the American Civil War
results.name: Civil War: A Nation Divided

results.deck: Real time strategy with emphasis on manipulation of media and civilians to achieve victory.
results.name: Conflict Zone

results.deck: Max Payne 2 is a film-noir action game in which the player takes control of Max Payne, in search of the murdering group masquerading as cleaners.
results.name: Max Payne 2: The Fall of Max Payne

results.deck: A video game based around French cartoon character Asterix attending the Olympics.
results.name: Asterix at the Olympic Games

results.deck: Players can get to know new animal pals in this expansion pack for the PC, or stand-alone title for the console and handheld systems.
results.name: The Sims 2: Pets

results.deck: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions is a driving/car combat game that involves two unique storylines in which you play as two female cops and two male spies, both duos enemies of the Yakuza.
results.name: Wreckless: The Yakuza Missions

results.deck: The eighth main entry in the Dragon Quest franchise. It was the first game in the series to utilize a full 3D environment and featured a cel-shaded graphics style which would become standard for all future games in the franchise.
results.name: Dragon Quest VIII: Journey of the Cursed King

results.deck: ESPN International Track & Field is a sports game that was released on the Dreamcast, and the PlayStation 2
results.name: ESPN International Track & Field

results.deck: The sequel to Brothers in Arms: Road to Hill 30, Earned in Blood lets you take control of Sergeant "Red" Hartsock as you lead your comrades in this World War 2 shooter.
results.name: Brothers in Arms: Earned in Blood

results.deck: Tony Hawk's Downhill Jam moves away from the flat free skate maps and instead focuses on speed and beating your opponents to the bottom of the map.
results.name: Tony Hawk's Downhill Jam

results.deck: Return to James Bond's roots in the video game interpretation of the 1963 film From Russia With Love, featuring the likeness and voice acting of Sean Connery.
results.name: 007: From Russia with Love

results.deck: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06 is the series debut on the Xbox 360. The game featured upgraded visuals and gameplay elements on the Xbox 360, but suffered from glitches and inaccessible achievements.
results.name: Tiger Woods PGA Tour 06

results.deck: An action video game based from the third installment of the Shrek movie series.
results.name: Shrek the Third

results.deck: In Shining Force: Neo, you play as a young fighter named Max who has finished his training that will make Him a Force. It is not a turn-based game at all, such as its predecessors for the previous gaming systems, opting for a more Diablo-style Action-Adventure game.
results.name: Shining Force: Neo

results.deck: A platformer released across multiple platforms to accompany the release of the 2004 movie of the same name
results.name: Lemony Snicket's A Series of Unfortunate Events

results.deck: The third release in the GTA Franchise stars silent criminal protagonist Claude, who after having been betrayed and left for dead is out for revenge.
results.name: Grand Theft Auto III

results.deck: Obscure is a survival horror game set in an American high school with such notable features as two player co-op and the ability to combine items.
results.name: Obscure

results.deck: DD:A is one of the flagship online games of the PS2, and is also one of the least successful.
results.name: Destruction Derby Arenas

results.deck: Phantom Brave is a strategy RPG for the PlayStation 2, and the first game to be published by NIS America.
results.name: Phantom Brave

results.deck: Boogie is a karaoke and dancing game originally released on the Wii. The game features nearly forty songs from the 1970s through the 2000s.
results.name: Boogie

results.deck: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.26: Dynamite Deka is a remake of the arcade game Dynamite Deka (aka Die Hard Arcade) for the Playstation 2.
results.name: SEGA AGES 2500 Vol.26: Dynamite Deka

results.deck: Fight for NY continues the story from Def Jam Vendetta while adding in new characters, venues, and gameplay elements.
results.name: Def Jam: Fight for NY

results.deck: Officer Nick Mason and the T-Zero riot response team fight against the Burners, a gang of maniacs who have pushed their city to the edge. Riot Response is an FPS with a focus on fast action and disaster movie-styled set-pieces.
results.name: Urban Chaos: Riot Response

results.deck: Dynasty Warriors 5 is a hack and slash video game set in China and the fifth installment in the Dynasty Warriors series. It is based on the Chinese novel "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luo Guanzhong.
results.name: Dynasty Warriors 5

results.deck: Based after the film of the same name, which was named after, but not based on, the comic book character of the same name, this tie-in game sees Patience Phillips gain a set of feline superpowers and use them to defeat an evil makeup designer.
results.name: Catwoman

results.deck: A prisoner escapes from the wizard prison Azkaban, and he goes after Harry.
results.name: Harry Potter and the Prisoner of Azkaban

results.deck: Arc the Lad: End of Darkness is drastically different from other Arc the Lad games, featuring a real-time battle system, card based power-ups, and boasting a cast of 24 playable characters.
results.name: Arc the Lad: End of Darkness

results.deck: Control Eike Kusch as he attempts to change the course of history and stop a mysterious figure from killing him.
results.name: Shadow of Destiny

results.deck: Based on the animated movie of the same name following the story of a penguin trying to find his rhythm
results.name: Happy Feet

results.deck: The Suffering is a freeware action-oriented horror game.
results.name: The Suffering

results.deck: Originally developed as a third game in the Deus Ex series. Project: Snowblind is a futuristic sci-fi first person shooter featuring numerous futuristic weapons and abilities.
results.name: Project: Snowblind

results.deck: Vrrrooom. That's the sound of a motorcycle.
results.name: Jacked

results.deck: Quake III: Arena is a popular multiplayer focused first-person shooter from iD Software released in 1999.
results.name: Quake III Arena

results.deck: A New Beginning is the first of the Legend of Spyro trilogy. The dragons are at war with the Malefor. The fate of the dragons lies in the hopes of the prophecy of the purple dragon. Spyro must fight the forces of Malefor and a black dragon named Cynder.
results.name: The Legend of Spyro: A New Beginning

results.deck: A budget title with stealth-action similar to the original Splinter Cell and a cover system similar to kill.switch.
results.name: Special Forces: Nemesis Strike

results.deck: Mobile Light Force 2, as with the first Mobile Light Force with which it shared an almost identical cover, is famous for being a poorly dubbed, poorly translated and poorly received version of a Japanese shoot-'em-up. In this case, Shikigami no Shiro.
results.name: Mobile Light Force 2

results.deck: A Japanese RPG that was never released in English territories, and the second game in the Tengai Makyou franchise.
results.name: Tengai Makyou II: Manjimaru

results.deck: View and navigate photos of the Japanese idol Mori Hiroko. Released in 2003.
results.name: Motion Gravure Series: Mori Hiroko

results.deck: In a future world were mankind and dolphins live together as equals, an alien force known as the Foe seeks to end this happy existence. The Foe damages the Earth's defense system, and alters history for the worse. One extraordinary dolphin, Ecco, must travel through time to set things right.
results.name: Ecco the Dolphin: Defender of the Future

results.deck: Harmonixer Yuri Hyuga makes his debut to stop Roger Bacon's mysterious plans and save the young Alice Elliot from capture in this pre-WWI turn-based RPG that features the innovative Judgement Ring battle system.
results.name: Shadow Hearts

results.deck: The high resolution 2D fighter returns, continuing the story and breakneck style of the previous iteration.
results.name: Guilty Gear X

results.deck: Help Serph and the Embryon learn the truth of the Junkyard while devouring their foes in the hopes to eventually ascend to Nirvana.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Digital Devil Saga

results.deck: Salt Lake 2002 is a winter sports game.
results.name: Salt Lake 2002

results.deck: Harmonixer Yuri Hyuga returns in this direct sequel to the 2001 RPG game Shadow Hearts with real historical elements. Yuri and his friends set on a journey across the world to combat the evil Rasputin and new evil entities that may well change the course of the 20th century.
results.name: Shadow Hearts: Covenant

results.deck: Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter is an arcade style air combat game, featuring a nimble Jedi starfighter with force powers, and a high tech bomber.
results.name: Star Wars: Jedi Starfighter

results.deck: MX Unleashed is a dirt-bike game that features races, a free-roam freestyle mode, and the ability to drive other vehicles.
results.name: MX Unleashed

results.deck: The fourth instalment of the series (Guitar Hero: Rock the 80's being the 3rd) that single handedly revitalized the music-game genre, Guitar Hero III retains the core gameplay of its predecessors while delivering a more challenging experience.
results.name: Guitar Hero III: Legends of Rock

results.deck: Project Eden is set in a dystopian future where humanity has built their cities on top of its older and now rotten past. A team of police agents are sent to investigate an incident in the Real Meat Packing company, where their case grows bigger as the investigation goes on.
results.name: Project Eden

results.deck: Take on the role of a redneck driving an 18 wheeler.
results.name: Big Mutha Truckers

results.deck: Yakko, Wakko and Dot are out from the confines of the Warner Bros. tower once more, in this late sixth-gen title.
results.name: Animaniacs: The Great Edgar Hunt

results.deck: The King of Fighters '97 is the fourth installment in the King of Fighters series and the conclusive installment in the "Orochi Saga".
results.name: The King of Fighters '97

results.deck: Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring is an action role-playing game that is based on the book of the same name.
results.name: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring

results.deck: It's a soccer game!
results.name: FIFA Soccer 2003

results.deck: Blitz: The League is an arcade style football game and is a part of the long running Blitz series by Midway.
results.name: Blitz: The League

results.deck: A Falcom-developed Action-RPG and the third Ys game. For the first time in the series, players have direct control over Adol's ability to attack, in addition to the ability to jump. Also, instead of being a top-down game like its predecessors, Ys III is a side-scrolling action-platformer.
results.name: Ys III: Wanderers from Ys

results.deck: Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles lets the player take control of Naruto and various other characters in the franchise to do missions to grow stronger and become hokkage.
results.name: Naruto: Uzumaki Chronicles

results.deck: A tennis game from Infogrames that was never released in the US.
results.name: Slam Tennis

results.deck: Madden NFL 2005 was one of the better years of the Madden series with improved features, physics, presentation and graphics.
results.name: Madden NFL 2005

results.deck: An action-adventure for the PlayStation 2 about a young man named Haven. Intended to be the first part of a trilogy, the game's poor sales left the story incomplete.
results.name: Haven: Call of the King

results.deck: Total Overdose is an arguably racist action game that mixes gameplay elements of GTA and Max Payne in a Mexican-style cocktail.
results.name: Total Overdose

results.deck: Arc the Lad: Twilight of the Spirits revolves around saving the world by playing through two opposing, yet similar characters, Kharg and Darc. Save the Deimos, save the Humans.
results.name: Arc the Lad: Twilight of the Spirits

results.deck: The King of Fighters '94 is a 3-on-3 fighting game by SNK that pits together fighters from the Fatal Fury and Art of Fighting franchises.
results.name: The King of Fighters '94

results.deck: Monster Rancher 3 is the 3rd installment in Namco's Monster Ranchers game series where you regenerate monsters from discs and raise them.
results.name: Monster Rancher 3

results.deck: The King of Fighters: Maximum Impact 2 was released in North America as The King of Fighters 2006, and is a sequel to The King of Fighters: Maximum Impact.
results.name: The King of Fighters 2006

results.deck: Area 51 for the Xbox, Playstation 2, and PC takes place in top secret base, Area 51 where you and your team were on a recon mission. All goes wrong and you end up on your own; left to venture further to escape, and uncover the truth behind it all.
results.name: Area-51

results.deck: In this fourth installment of the Virtua Fighter series, smash your opponents in beautiful graphics, and train your own fighter! Released for the Sega NAOMI 2 arcade system in 2001 and for the PS2 console in 2002.
results.name: Virtua Fighter 4

results.deck: Crush Hour takes the wrestlers of the WWE and inexplicably drops them into a car combat game.
results.name: WWE Crush Hour

results.deck: Spy Hunter: Nowhere to Run is the third game in the vehicle-combat franchise. Nowhere to Run is the first game to add on-foot missions to the series.
results.name: Spy Hunter: Nowhere to Run

results.deck: A Konami run-and-gun famous for its fast-paced, gritty, old-school action.
results.name: Contra

results.deck: Football with no rules.
results.name: NFL Blitz 20-03

results.deck: Take to the skis with 3DO's aerial dog-fighting extravaganza for the PlayStation 1 & 2
results.name: WarJetz

results.deck: TMNT is based on the 2007 CGI movie, and features action-platforming with some teamwork-based gameplay elements.
results.name: TMNT

results.deck: Persona 3 offers a unique RPG experience, combining elements of Japanese role-playing and dating simulations.
results.name: Shin Megami Tensei: Persona 3

results.deck: The player is called by a mysterious dragon to destroy an empire that is unlocking ancient powers it cannot comprehend.
results.name: Panzer Dragoon
